debug help
https://www.rapidtables.com/code/linux/gcc/gcc-g.html

you need to use gdb on windows and id say linux as //www.rapidtables.com/code/linux/gcc/gcc

Keep in mind these configs probably need to switch depending on which 
OS you are using
